instructions: Go to Settings . Tap your name. Select iCloud . In the Apps Using iCloud section, scroll to Find My iPhone . If Find My iPhone is turned off, tap Find My iPhone . In the Find My iPhone screen, turn on the Find My iPhone toggle switch. In some versions of iOS, you may be prompted to Send Last Location when the device is about to run out of battery power. Find My iPhone doesn't work on devices with no battery power. To send the last known location of the device to Apple, select On .
